app.title: Innovation Expert AI
app.subtitle: Pattern Analysis
app.description: Describe your innovative project for evaluation based on 200+ case histories and proprietary methodology.
app.methodology: Proprietary methodology on curated knowledge bases

welcome.message: Hello! I'm your Innovation Expert AI. I have access to Notion databases with over 200 case histories and best practices to evaluate startups and innovative projects. Use the quick prompts to get started or ask me a specific question.

form.placeholder: Describe your startup or innovative project for evaluation...

analysis.completed: ‚úÖ Analysis completed! Proceed with validation to generate calibrated scoring.
analysis.notAvailable: Section not available. Please complete a full analysis first.
analysis.error: Error generating response. Please try again.

help.quickPrompts: üí° Use Quick Prompts in the sidebar or describe your project for a complete evaluation

evalStartup.prompt: Analyze this startup idea using the innovation evaluation methodology from Notion databases. Provide a structured score and compare with similar case histories.

marketAnalysis.prompt: Provide a detailed market analysis for this innovation, including trends, competitors and opportunities based on best practices from Notion databases.

bestPractices.prompt: Show me the most relevant best practices for this sector, extracting insights from available case histories in Notion databases.

compareCases.prompt: Compare this project with the most relevant case histories in Notion databases, highlighting similarities, differences and lessons learned.

deepDive.examples: üí° Examples: "What are the main risks?", "How can I differentiate?", "Which metrics to monitor?"

placeholder.jtbdTrends: Ask about Jobs-to-be-Done and market trends...

buttons.comingSoon: üöÄ Interactive analysis coming in next update

validation.title: Validation for Calibrated Assessment
validation.description: Describe your approach for each strategic dimension.
validation.detailedTip: üí° Detailed responses (minimum 20 words) generate more accurate scoring

instructions.title: Instructions and Methodology
instructions.subtitle: Complete guide to using Innovation Expert AI and understanding our proprietary methodology

methodology.title: Proprietary Methodology
methodology.description: Innovation Expert AI uses a proprietary methodology based on over 300 real and selected case histories, analyzed and curated by our team of experts. The system combines:
features: Advanced Pattern Recognition: Identification of convergent strategic patterns through analysis of successful startups and innovations
Vertical-Specific Insights: Focused analysis by strategic vertical with sector benchmarks
Multi-Stage Validation: Structured validation process with questions calibrated on real data
Calibrated Scoring: Scoring system based on metrics validated by historical case studies

steps.title: Input & Query
steps.description: Describe your project, startup or innovation in natural language

steps.title: Intelligent Analysis
steps.description: The system analyzes your input against the database of 300+ case studies

steps.title: Structured Validation
steps.description: Answer calibrated questions to validate the analysis

steps.title: Final Scoring
steps.description: Receive a calibrated score and actionable insights

deepDiveSections.title: Deep Dive Sections
deepDiveSections.description: After the initial analysis, you can dive deeper into specific aspects through Deep Dive sections:
deepDiveSections.jtbd: Analysis of fundamental needs and market trends

quickPrompts.title: Suggested Quick Prompts
quickPrompts.description: Use these prompts to get specific and targeted analysis:
quickPrompts.startup: Evaluate this startup idea: [describe your idea]
quickPrompts.market: Analyze the market for [sector/product] and identify opportunities
quickPrompts.practices: Show me the best practices for [specific area] based on case studies
quickPrompts.compare: Compare my idea with similar case studies in the database

items.title: Be specific
items.description: Provide concrete details about your project, target market, and value proposition

items.title: Sector context
items.description: Specify the sector or vertical reference for more targeted analysis

items.title: Development phase
items.description: Indicate if you are in ideation, MVP, or growth phase for calibrated advice

items.title: Accurate validation
items.description: Answer validation questions honestly for reliable scoring

items.title: Explore Deep Dive
items.description: Use specific sections for targeted insights

instructions.footer: Innovation Expert AI - Proprietary methodology on curated knowledge bases
